00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace pwiz::util;
00034 using namespace pwiz::frequency;
00035 using namespace pwiz::data;
00036 using namespace pwiz::data::peakdata;

00038 
00039 ostream* os_ = 0;
00040 
00041 
00042 void testCreation()
00043 {
00044     const double noiseFactor = 666;
00045     const unsigned int detectionRadius = 13;
00046     auto_ptr<PeakDetectorNaive> pd = PeakDetectorNaive::create(noiseFactor, detectionRadius);
00047     unit_assert(pd->noiseFactor() == noiseFactor);
00048     unit_assert(pd->detectionRadius() == detectionRadius);
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 FrequencyDatum data_[] = 
00053 {
00054     FrequencyDatum(0, 0), 
00055     FrequencyDatum(1, 1), // peak radius 1
00056     FrequencyDatum(2, 0),
00057     FrequencyDatum(3, 1),
00058     FrequencyDatum(4, 2), // peak radius 2
00059     FrequencyDatum(5, 1),
00060     FrequencyDatum(6, 0),
00061     FrequencyDatum(7, 1),
00062     FrequencyDatum(8, 2),
00063     FrequencyDatum(9, 3), // peak radius 3
00064     FrequencyDatum(10, 2),
00065     FrequencyDatum(11, 1),
00066     FrequencyDatum(12, 0)
00067 };
00068 
00069 
00070 const unsigned int dataSize_ = sizeof(data_)/sizeof(FrequencyDatum);
00071 
00072 
00073 void testFind()
00074 {
00075     FrequencyData fd;
00076     copy(data_, data_+dataSize_, back_inserter(fd.data()));
00077     if (os_) copy(fd.data().begin(), fd.data().end(), ostream_iterator<FrequencyDatum>(*os_, "\n"));
00078     fd.analyze();
00079 
00080     PeakData pd;
00081     pd.scans.resize(3);
00082 
00083     const double noiseFactor = 1;
00084 
00085     auto_ptr<PeakDetectorNaive> pdn1 = PeakDetectorNaive::create(noiseFactor, 1);
00086     pdn1->findPeaks(fd, pd.scans[0]);
00087     unit_assert(pd.scans[0].peakFamilies.size() == 3);
00088 
00089     auto_ptr<PeakDetectorNaive> pdn2 = PeakDetectorNaive::create(noiseFactor, 2);
00090     pdn2->findPeaks(fd, pd.scans[1]);
00091     unit_assert(pd.scans[1].peakFamilies.size() == 2);
00092 
00093     auto_ptr<PeakDetectorNaive> pdn3 = PeakDetectorNaive::create(noiseFactor, 3);
00094     pdn3->findPeaks(fd, pd.scans[2]);
00095     unit_assert(pd.scans[2].peakFamilies.size() == 1);
00096 
00097     if (os_)
00098     {
00099         *os_ << "pd:\n" << pd << endl;
00100 
00101         for (unsigned int i=0; i<pd.scans.size(); i++)
00102         {
00103             *os_ << "scan " << i << ":\n"; 
00104             pd.scans[i].printSimple(*os_);    
00105         }
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 void test()
00111 {
00112     testCreation();
00113     testFind();
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00118 {
00119     try
00120     {
00121         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00122         if (os_) *os_ << "PeakDetectorNaiveTest\n";
00123         test();
00124         return 0;
00125     }
00126     catch (exception& e)
00127     {
00128         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00129         return 1;
00130     }
00131 }
